message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,800 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further, but $10,500 is my absolute minimum.  Let me know if you're interested in that price.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down to $10,500, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,250. I think that's a fair price for both of us.
